name: nearmiss-o-meter
tagline: Recording space given by drivers of motor vehicles when passing people on bikes
body:
### The nearmiss-o-meter
The goal of this project is to provide information that will allow anyone to build a small battery powered unit that can measure passing distances and correlate with a GPS trace.

The data collected could then be used to influence transport policy and help create a safe environment for people on bikes.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
